string.name: cat_navigation_rail_title
string.description: The title for the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_description
string.description: Brief summary about navigation rail componentdemo. [CHAR_LIMIT=500]

resources.string: Navigation Rails make it easy to explore and switch between top-level views in a single tap. This navigational element resides at the bottom of the screen, and provides direct access for three to five destinations within an app.

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_additional_controls_demo_title
string.description: Label for the demo that shows how the look and behavior navigation rail may be configured. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_animated_demo_title
string.description: Label the navigation rail demo that shows animated icons [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_compact_demo_title
string.description: Label for the demo that shows navigation rail in compact style. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_1_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_2_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_3_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_4_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_5_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_6_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_page_7_name
string.description: The title of a page in the navigation rail demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_add_nav_item
string.description: Label for the button that will add a destination to the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_remove_nav_item
string.description: Label for the button that will the last destination from the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_increment_badge_number
string.description: The title of a button to increment the notification number. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_add_header_view
string.description: Label for the button that will add a header view to the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_remove_header_view
string.description: Label for the button that will remove the header view from the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_icon_size_slider_title
string.description: Label for the current icon size display. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_menu_gravity_control_title
string.description: Label for the group of choices that controls how destinations will be grouped in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_menu_gravity_top
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destinations to be grouped at the top of the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_menu_gravity_center
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destinations to be grouped at the center of the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_menu_gravity_bottom
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destinations to be grouped at the bottom of the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_label_visibility_mode_title
string.description: Label for the group of choices that controls if and when the destination labels will be displayed in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_label_visibility_mode_auto
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destination lables to be displayed automatically based on the total number of destinations in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_label_visibility_mode_selected
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destination lables to be displayed only for the currently selected destination in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_label_visibility_mode_labeled
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destination lables to be displayed always in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_label_visibility_mode_unlabeled
string.description: Label for the choice that will cause the destination lables to be hidden always in the navigation rail. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_badge_gravity_spinner_label
string.description: Label for the dropdown that controls where badges will be positioned relative to the icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_badge_gravity_top_end
string.description: Label for the option that will cause badges to be positioned at the end, above the icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_badge_gravity_top_start
string.description: Label for the option that will cause badges to be positioned at the start, above the icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_badge_gravity_bottom_end
string.description: Label for the option that will cause badges to be positioned at the end, below the icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_badge_gravity_bottom_start
string.description: Label for the option that will cause badges to be positioned at starting, below the icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_alarm
string.description: Label for an alarm icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_clock
string.description: Label for a clock icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_timer
string.description: Label for a timer icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_stopwatch
string.description: Label for a stopwatch icon. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: cat_navigation_rail_fab_content_desc
string.description: Content description for a floating action button in the navigation rail.[CHAR_LIMIT=50]
